EmailTemplate.name: 08-30-22 DBNK Financial Wellness Webinar Email 1.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Register! [Webinar] Financial Wellness Moment of Truth
EmailTemplate.textOnly: With the current economic climate, financial institutions need to have a laser-sharp focus on supporting their customers and members during difficult times. Join NCR and MX as they talk about financial institutions' massive opportunity to help consumers and small business owners elevate their financial literacy and proficiency. MX will also share new research findings on money management and financial wellness. Financial Wellness Moment of Truth: Stop Talking Literacy, Start Talking Proficiency Thursday, September 8 at 2 p.m. EDT / 11 a.m. PDT Register now <[[https://bit.ly/3dsY2Yh]]> with discount code: NCR908 Key topics of this one-hour webinar include: - Generational money management habits and current debt and retirement trends - Financial stressors and how people are feeling about their financial future compared to last year - How consumers are using technology to manage their financial well-being We hope you'll join us! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
